email_subject: Storage of Cycles at the Body Shop
email_body: Should I appeal to Skilling. ---------------------- Forwarded by Phillip K Allen/HOU/ECT on 02/15/2000 12:52 PM --------------------------- Lee Wright@ENRON 02/15/2000 10:48 AM To: Phillip K Allen/HOU/ECT@ECT cc: Amelia Alder/OTS/Enron@ENRON Subject: Storage of Cycles at the Body Shop Phillip - I applaud you for using your cycle as daily transportation. Saves on gas, pollution and helps keep you strong and healthy. Enron provides bike racks in the front of the building for requests such as this. Phillip, I wish we could accommodate this request; however, The Body Shop does not have the capacity nor can assume the responsibility for storing cycles on a daily basis. If you bring a very good lock you should be able to secure the bike at the designated outside racks. Keep Pedalling - Lee
